thread.title: Fiorina makes distortion of Planned Parenthood a centerpiece
thread.title_full: Fiorina makes distortion of Planned Parenthood a centerpiece

title: Fiorina makes distortion of Planned Parenthood a centerpiece
text:
> Political Fiorina makes distortion of Planned Parenthood a centerpiece Republican presidential candidate Carly Fiorina flanked by U.S.Rep. Trey Gowdy, R-S.C, left, and Senator Tim Scott, R-S.C., speaks at town hall meeting at the University of South Carolina at Aiken Convocation Center, Friday afternoon, Oct. 2, 2015, in Aiken, S.C.
